short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Content blocker extension that helps you at your time of need

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension is a content blocking extension that focuses on blocking pornographic websites. It contains a list of curated websites that are known to be pornographic in nature. The website content is replaced with a verse of the bible. Users install it to protect their browsers from unwanted content
